item.title: Hennessy digs deep to beat Bouttell on points
item.description: British bantamweight Francesca Hennessy moves closer to a world title shot but has to dig deep for a tough points win over Ellie Bouttell.

item.title: Kelly outpoints Murtazaliev to win world title
item.description: Britain's Josh Kelly puts on a slick performance to beat Bakhram Murtazaliev and win the IBF light-middleweight title by majority decision in Newcastle.

item.title: Kraus stops Crighton in second round
item.description: Dutchman Gradus Kraus needs only two rounds to beat Britain's Boris Crighton by stoppage in their light-heavyweight bout in London.

item.title: Kraus and daughter's synchronised dance during ringwalk
item.description: Gradus Kraus is joined by his daughter on his ringwalk before his win over Britain's Boris Crighton in London.

item.title: 'I had seven caffeine shots in 15 minutes' - from hypochondria to title shot
item.description: British light-middleweight Josh Kelly tells BBC Sport about how he won his battle with chronic hypochondria to emerge as a world title contender.

item.title: Chisora v Wilder confirmed for London's O2 Arena
item.description: Derek Chisora's fight with former world heavyweight champion Deontay Wilder is confirmed for the O2 Arena in London on 4 April.

item.title: World champion Price to face Aquino live on BBC
item.description: Welsh boxer Lauren Price will defend her unified welterweight world titles against Puerto Rican challenger Stephanie Pineiro Aquino on Saturday, 4 April at Cardiff's Utilita Arena.

item.title: Lopez v Stevenson marred by ugly build-up
item.description: Shakur Stevenson was restrained by security after confronting Teofimo Lopez in an ugly build-up to Saturday's world-title fight.

item.title: 'Not a typical heavyweight' - Osadolor set for debut
item.description: Heavyweight boxer Derrick Osadolor says that he is "ready to showcase" his skills on Saturday when he makes his professional debut on the BBC.

item.title: How an inspiring home video launched a main event fighter
item.description: How Francesca Hennessy - who headlines on BBC Two on Saturday - went from weight and dyslexia struggles to viral fame and in sight of a world-title shot.

item.title: Joshua pays emotional tribute in new video
item.description: Anthony Joshua posts an emotional YouTube video thanking fans for their support following the deaths of his two close friends in a car crash in Nigeria.

item.title: Watch every episode
item.description: Natasha Jonas and Chris Eubank Jr feature

item.title: Hennessy stays undefeated with win over Bytyqi
item.description: Francesca Hennessy remains undefeated in seven fights as all three judges score it 100-90 in her favour over Fabiana Bytyqi.

item.title: I can't imagine what Joshua is going through - Bunce
item.description:
Boxing expert Steve Bunce says he can't imagine the "type of condition" Anthony Joshua is in following a crash that killed two of his close friends and team members. Sina Ghami and Latif Ayodele died when the vehicle they were in collided with a stationary truck in Lagos, Nigeria.
Sina Ghami and Latif Ayodele died when the vehicle they were in collided with a stationary truck in Nigeria.

item.title: Pouring pints and 'unfinished business' - meet Britain's newest world champion
item.description: Delayed flights, opponent's failed drug tests and broadcaster issues - how Dalton Smith overcame the odds to become world champion.

item.title: Pierce Brosnan, Prince Naz and the embrace that never happened
item.description: When Prince Naseem Hamed met actor Pierce Brosnan in the lead-up to a new film, it brought back thoughts of a reconciliation with trainer Brendan Ingle that never happened.

item.title: 'Out of the ring, he was fighting another fight'
item.description: How former European champion James Cook changed lives through his tireless work at one of London's oldest youth clubs.

item.title: Small halls in crisis - boxing's lifeblood is struggling to breathe
item.description: Small-hall boxing has long been considered the sport's lifeblood. But right now, it is struggling for survival. BBC Sport finds out why.

item.title: For four days, I didn't know if my family was alive - Williamson
item.description: British boxer Troy Williamson - who faces Callum Simpson live on BBC on Saturday - reveals how Hurricane Melissa ruined his family home and bar in Jamaica.

item.title: 'Paul was sitting there waiting to get hit' - Lewis leads big-name reaction
item.description: Former heavyweight champion Lennox Lewis believes Jake Paul 's fitness played a role in his sixth-round stoppage defeat against Anthony Joshua.

item.title: 'They told me to choose between my hijab and boxing'
item.description: How Germany's Zeina Nassar - who makes her pro debut on Wednesday - rewrote boxing's rules about fighting in a hijab.

item.title: 'You're under arrest' - how Ngamba made history against all odds
item.description: Cindy Ngamba shares her incredible story from refugee to Olympic medallist.

item.title: 'I wouldn't wish what I went through on my worst enemy'
item.description: Undisputed middleweight boxing world champion Claressa Shields opens up about her harrowing journey to the top of her sport.

item.title: From rock bottom to three world titles at 37
item.description: Natasha Jonas tells her story, including what it took to come back and win three world titles at 37.

item.title: Being a Eubank, living up to dad and dealing with grief
item.description: Born To Brawl: Chris Eubank Jr tells his story of grief and living up to his dad

item.title: Are Prince Naseem Hamed's sons coming for his throne?
item.description: Get to know the Hameds' journey ahead of Aadam Hamed's debut on the Oleksandr Usyk v Daniel Dubois undercard.

item.title: Tyson rates him: Is traveller Dennis McCann boxing's next superstar?
item.description: Tyson Fury tips traveller boxer Dennis ‘The Menace’ McCann as future world champion

item.title: I'm going to show the world - Hennessy
item.description: Francesca Hennessy talks to BBC Sport about her inspirations and goals before her fight against Ellie Boutell.

item.title: 'I gave everything to boxing and still have nothing'
item.description: Heather Hardy tells BBC Sport how she is adapting to life outside of boxing after the former world champion was left with a life-threatening injury.

item.title: Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in fight in US
item.description: The story of Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in a sanctioned fight in the United States.
